title: To Love and Obey
description: Addison Mathews is the only daughter of a famous mother and a billionaire father. Even though she learned at an early age to be wary of people, she claimed Cade Ramsey the day she met him. Now, years later, Cade has finally asked her out and she believes her dreams of belonging to him are finally coming true.Cade Ramsey is a former Green Beret and a no-tolerance Dom who believes that love can’t be trusted. He and his four brothers co-own Club Mystique, an expensive and exclusive BDSM club. When Cade decides to give up the BDSM lifestyle and have a vanilla marriage he chooses Addison as the perfect woman to be his wife and the mother of his children. Cade expects to put a ring on Addison’s finger and have her married and living in his home by summer. Addison changes his plans when she discovers Cade’s secret life as a Dom. Intrigued by the D/s lifestyle she decides to prove to him that she would be the perfect sub as well as the perfect wife. Addison and Cade each have their own idea of what their relationship should be. Just as it looks as if they might work out their differences an enemy of Cade's goes after Addison. Cade finds himself fighting to save her but will he be able to overcome the distrust of his childhood in time to have a future with Addison?
author: Mardi Maxwell
